Williamson, Mark wrote:

>Hi,
>
>Last night I was doing a broad ranging crawl from 
>(www.yahoo.com , path depth 3, disk included frontier 
>and broadscope, slightly more agressive than default)
>and this morning it had -1 of 50 active threads. The log 
>files where full of too many files open errors. I had 
>hit about 12000 unique domains ( I was gathering URLS to
>test a consistent hash algorithm). 
>
>I seem to be able to reproduce this consistently - is this 
>a know bug or is there a setting I can change to help it?
>
>cheers 
>  
>
Heyup Mark.

On the too many open files, checkout the FAQ.  You'll have to boost your

limit if you're doing broad crawls:  
http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#toomanyopenfiles.  You might want to

also check the Known Limitations doc. if you haven't already since 
you're trying broad crawls:  
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/limitations.html.

Hope that helps some.
Good on you  Mark,
St.Ack

>mark
